SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_PURCHASE_LIST WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND ORDER_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ORDER_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT PURCHASE_ID, PURCHASE_CODE, ORDER_DATE, BP_ID, SUPPLIER_NAME, TOTAL_AMOUNT, STATUS, EMP_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, CREATED_AT, REMARK FROM V_PURCHASE_LIST WHERE PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId}

SELECT d.PURCHASE_DETAIL_ID, d.PURCHASE_ID, d.ITEM_ID, i.ITEM_CODE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.SPEC, d.ORDER_QTY, d.UNIT_PRICE, d.ORDER_QTY * d.UNIT_PRICE AS AMOUNT, d.REQUIRED_DELIVERY_DATE, d.REMARK, i.UNIT_CODE, cc.CODE_DESC AS UNIT_NAME FROM PURCHASE_DETAIL d JOIN ITEM i ON d.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN COMMON_CODE cc ON i.UNIT_CODE = cc.CODE_ID AND cc.CODE_TYPE = 'UNIT_CODE' WHERE d.PURCHASE_ID = #{purchaseId} ORDER BY d.PURCHASE_DETAIL_ID
